description: Like everyday, this day begins with Kyou doing newspaper deliveries and Asu preparing breakfast. Both look forward to the firework festival this evening, an event they used to visit every year. Asu has been saving money in the piggy-bank all year to make this day lots of fun together with her onee-san, and without telling her she has already worked out a plan for which stands to visit on the festival. But when she returns home she finds the piggy-bank empty.

titles.title: A Yukata, Fireworks And Candy Apples Day
Um dia de Yukatas, Fogos de Artifício e Maçãs do Amor
Yukata to Hanabi to Ringoame no Hi
浴衣と花火とりんご飴の日
